Text.Page:
We must occupy the Skyleaves and stop Thulsa's forces from securing Darkquaver Woods.

Find Ebna—she's gone ahead to scout the area. Help her however you can. Move quickly. Time is not our ally.

Oh, I've seen things all right. The Ksharans ambushed an amani officer and his guards.

I need to report this, but the Ksharans are too numerous. Think you can tackle the Ksharan shadow archers and shadow reavers?

Bring me some proof of their deaths. We'll need evidence when we ask for reinforcements.

If I were Thulsa, I'd make killing you a top priority. You've done great work. I'll get word to my superiors—and show them these amulets.

For the federation!
Kill all the Ksharans you want, just get me proof. Nobody ever takes a scout at their word.
